pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, June 9, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Los Angeles, United States of America

Private meetings

9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Governor of California, Gavin Newsom.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister and the Governor of California, Gavin Newsom, will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Environment and Climate Change Steven Guilbeault will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Leaders’ Opening Plenary Session of the Summit of the Americas.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Argentina, Alberto Fernández.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the CEO of Alphabet and Google, Sundar Pichai.

Closed to media

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will attend a Leaders’ Dinner hosted by the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden, and the First Lady of the United States of America, Dr. Jill Biden.

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage
